title: Banning the same champs with new system
body: So i was recently duo'ing with a mate, we locked our bans, they enemies did theirs. And we noticed that Darius, Zed and Yasuo were banned on both teams. Neither team could revoke and re-choose. Is this a bug? It seems counter intuitive. All answers appreciated.

replies.body:
Its intended. 

I cant remember the exact reasoning. But probably something to do with potentially too many popular picks being locked out, so this method you would only really ban your own counter.
